ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: AFAM 895 01 is a wonderful course that helps to keep you on track to making consistent progress in developing your dissertation project. I would definitely recommend it to another student.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Watching Professor Stepto lead the course was a wonderful lesson in watching how a great professor advises and helps students reach their full potential. He was firm while also being supportive, and his advice and suggestions were always excellent. In this sense, it deepened my knowledge of the profession of teaching, advising, and mentoring. This course contributed greatly to my research, as it steadily guided me as I worked to complete my prospectus and forced me to take important steps toward completing my prospectus that I would have put off for later dates without the guidance from the course.
